extendedInfo.description: Droid X2 Wallpapers for all your android phones and tablets. HD Background can be set as your home screen as wallpapers.High Quality Wallpapers Backgrounds FAQ:1.HOW TO DOWNLOAD IMAGE SD CARD?NO NEED TO DOWNLOAD THE IMAGES TO SD CARD ALL IMAGES ARE AUTOMATICALLY SAVED TO SD CARD ONLY THING YOU NEED TO KEEP USING APPLICATION TO SET WALLPAPER TO YOUR HOME SCREEN.APPLICATION WILL NOT DOWNLOAD THE IMAGES EVERY LAUNCH IT WILL BE CACHED IN SD CARD WITHOUT INTERNET CONNECTION APPLICATION WILL WORK. TO VIEW AND SET WALLPAPERS YOU MUST USE THIS APPLICATION.2.DOESN'T WORK AT ALL?PRESS MENU KEY SELECT REFRESH TO DOWNLOAD IMAGE FEED.3.IMAGES NOT DOWNLOADING AND LOADING VERY SLOW?PLEASE BE PATIENCE AND LOAD ALL IMAGES BY SCROLLING AND KEEP USING WITHOUT INTERNET CONNECTION. AS THIS IS HD IMAGES WILL TAKE TIME TO DOWNLOAD IN 2D INTERNET CONNECTION. IMAGES SIZE ARE 100KB TO 150KB. IN 3G AND WiFi CONNECTION IMAGES WILL DOWNLOAD AVERAGE TIME IS 5 Sec EACH IMAGES.Images Are collected from internet All images are copyright their original owners.

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: I\'m new to Android and its vast number of apps, and I really like this one.  The images are beautiful and dramatic, and the app is super easy to use.  Two thumbs up!
reviews.author: A Google User
